properties.Key_Activi: 1. Soil conservation practices -  Mr. R.M Culabandara's land and surrounding lands (50°-70°)
properties.Proposed_m: 1. Live fencing/SALT  - 1000 m/ 2. Lock and spills - 250 m/ 3. Stone terracing - 250 m/ 4. Agronomic practices should be adapted at optimum level (conservation tillage, crop rotation and diversification, cover crops, mulching, contour farming, windbreaks
properties.Contributi: Labour and other basic services by the Local community
